attributes.action: prevent children being used as media fodder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jade Goody's young sons were encouraged to pose for the cameras just after her death, in a way I found sickening. No child, who is unable to give informed consent to being the subject of a media story, should be featured if the aim is only to sell more papers and not for the benefit of the child.
